alert.note: Alert for Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 19 at 9:02PM MDT until June 20 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WIBAUX COUNTY... At 901 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Golva, or 8 miles south of Beach, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carlyle and Saint Phillip. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
